title: Web Development Practical Competency Enhancement: Teletraining-Based Instructional Design Course Support Environment Development

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational theories of educational technology and proficiency in digital tool utilization
context.additional_context: Practical Competency Enhancement Program for IT/Software Development Professionals

learning_goals: Learners can apply each stage of the instructional design process (analysis-design-development-implementation-evaluation) using telematics tools.
Learners can design learner-centered interactive educational content in a VR simulation environment.
Learners can improve their instructional design outputs by exchanging peer feedback through digital platforms.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
